sentences.english: He posted a notice on his MySpace site about the party and 500 people turned up to his suburban home in Melbourne on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 周六，500人闻讯赶到了他位于墨尔本郊区的家中。

sentences.english: On hearing the alarm the fire brigade rushed to the scene.
However, news reporters, they do not see the plane.
sentences.chinese: 不过，记者闻讯赶来时，却没有看到那架飞机。

sentences.english: Dogs and black woman rushed to night, to stop the black ant.
sentences.chinese: 夜犬和黑婆闻讯赶来，想阻拦黑蚁。

sentences.english: Local press got wind of the company and made a lot of noise about it.
sentences.chinese: 当地的媒体闻讯公司的做法，进行了连篇累牍的报道。

sentences.english: To know the truth of Peter is very angry and beat even to the tower.
sentences.chinese: 知道真相的皮特非常生气，打了闻讯而来的塔利。

sentences.english: A few bruiser, even to an irreverent hit Bai Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 几个彪形大汉闻讯而至，毫不客气揍了白宙一顿。

sentences.english: This lady hears the news, specially came to Dandong to put his son back.
sentences.chinese: 庄夫人闻讯，特意来到丹东要把儿子抓回去。

sentences.english: Dont want to, and fight a halfway cheng yaojin, the east China sea dragon were killed will come.
sentences.chinese: 不想，半路又杀出一个程咬金，东海龙闻讯杀将过来。

sentences.english: Hearing the news, Chong Er escaped from the state of Jin, remaining a fugitive for more than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 重耳闻讯，逃出了晋国，在外流忘十几年。

sentences.english: Xin Bei and Liu Bang rush to the hospital and apologise to them.
sentences.chinese: 欣北和刘帮闻讯赶来，向两老道歉。

sentences.english: Family members were told of the situation and were either at the hospital or en route, Oxman said.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成员闻讯后都往医院里赶，奥克斯曼说。

definition: that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
at top speed/at a tremendous lick
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to find out/to know/to learn about
